name: SD - Speed - 1
definition: % of Calls Answered within 30 seconds
calculation: Number of telephone call Contacts answered by a Service Desk agent within the applicable time frame during a Reporting Window over total number of telephone call Contacts during the same Reporting Window  expressed as a percentage.

name: SD - Speed - 2
description: Speed to Answer - Incident Self Service Tickets
definition: % of Self-Service Tickets Answered within 4 hours

name: SD - Speed - Chat
definition: % of Service Desk Chat Answered within 2 minutes

name: SD - Process - 2
definition: % of LSA Tickets Routed within 30 minutes
measurement: Measures the percentage of Tickets regarding Incidents related to Limited Service Applications (only Phone Calls)
calculation: Number of Tickets for Incidents related to Limited Service Applications routed to the correct resolver group at the correctly determined Severity Level by a Service Desk agent within the applicable time frame (as per the applicable procedure in the Procedures Manual) during a Reporting Window over total number of Tickets for Incidents related to Limited Service Applications during the same Reporting Window  expressed as a percentage.

name: SD - Resolution - 1
description: Resolved on first Contact to SD (FCR)
definition: % of Tickets Resolved by the same Service Desk Agent within 24 hours
measurement: Measures number of Incidents Resolved by Service Desk support agents on the first Contact to the Service Desk. (Excludes incidents the Service Provider is not capable of resolving)
calculation: Number of Incidents Resolved by Service Desk support agents on the first Contact to the Service Desk  during a Reporting Window over total number of Incident Contacts to the Service Desk during the same Reporting Window  expressed as a percentage.

name: SD - Resolution - 2
definition: % of Tickets Resolved within 48 hours without escalation to non-L1 groups
measurement: Measures number of Tickets Resolved by Service Desk support agents without escalation within the same day.
calculation: Number of Tickets Created and Resolved by the Service Desk within the same day without escalationover total number of Tickets  to the Service Desk during the same Reporting Window  expressed as a percentage.

name: SD - Abandon - 1
definition: % of Calls Abandoned
measurement: Measures the Abandon Rate for all telephone call Contacts made to the Service Desk during a calendar month
calculation: The Abandon Rate of all telephone call Contacts made to the Service Desk for a calendar month shall be no greater than the rate provided in the metric.

name: SD - Account - 3
definition: % completion of all AD password reset within 15 minutes
measurement: Turnaround time from receipt of approved request to completion.
calculation: Number of Requestor Account administration requests that are completed in the applicable time frame during a Reporting Window over total number of Requestor Account administration requests during the same Reporting Window  expressed as a percentage.

name: SD - Account - 4
definition: % completion of all Suspension of Account within 10 minutes
measurement: Turnaround time from receipt of approved request to completion
calculation: Number of expedited Requestor Account administration requests that are completed in the applicable time frame during a Reporting Window over total number of expedited level 3 Requestor Account administration requests during the same Reporting Window  expressed as a percentage.

name: Response-Platinum
definition: % of Tickets Responded related to Platinum users within 15 minutes

name: Response-Gold
description: Response on all Gold Service Location
definition: % of Self-Service Tickets Answered within 4 hours

name: Response-Dispatch
definition: % of Tickets Responded related to Dispatch Site Locations within 4 hours

name: Resolve-Platinum(A)
definition: % of Tickets Resolved related to Platinum users within 4 hours

name: Resolve-Platinum(B)
definition: % of Tickets Resolved related to Platinum users within 8 hours

name: Resolve-Gold-P1 - Critical
description: Resolution on P1 Gold Service Location
definition: % of P1 Tickets Resolved related to Gold Site Locations within 1 hour

name: Resolve-Gold-P2 - Urgent
description: Resolution on P2 Gold Service Location
definition: % of P2 Tickets Resolved related to Gold Site Locations within 3 hour

name: Resolve-Gold-P3 - Normal(A)
description: Resolution on P3 Gold Service Location
definition: % of P3 Tickets Resolved related to Gold Site Locations within 9 hour

name: Resolve-Gold-P3 - Normal(B)
description: Resolution on P3 Gold Service Location
definition: % of P3 Tickets Resolved related to Gold Site Locations within 18 hour

name: Resolve-Dispatch
definition: % of Tickets Resolved related to Dispatch Site Locations within 8 hours

name: IMAC-1
description: Standard Request for all Service Locations
definition: % of Standard request completed within 3 days

name: IMAC-3
description: Expedited Request for EUC Hard IMACs
definition: % of Expedited request completed within 9 hours

name: P - Patch - 3
definition: % deployed approved patches within 21 days

name: SP-3A SR Software Packages
definition: % of packages completed within 10 business days

name: SP-3B SR Software Packages
definition: % of packages completed within 14 business days

name: INC - Respond - 1
definition: % of Incident Tickets Responded within 15 minutes (Global/Extensive)

name: INC - Respond - 2
definition: % of Incident Tickets Responded within 30 minutes (Significant/Large)

name: INC - Respond - 3
definition: % of Incident Tickets Responded within 60 minutes (Moderate/Limited)

name: INC - Resolve - 1
definition: % of Incident Tickets Resolve within 8 hours (Global/Extensive)

name: INC - Resolve - 2
definition: % of Incident Tickets Resolve within 16 hours (Significant/Large)

name: INC - Resolve - 3
definition: % of Incident Tickets Resolve 24 hours (Moderate/Limited)

name: Requested Item - 2
definition: % completetion of Requested Task within 4 hours

name: Requested Item - 3
definition: % completetion of Requested Task within 8 hours

name: Requested Item - 5
definition: % completetion of Requested Task within 4 days
